item.title: Mallorca – more than just a party island!
item.author: Tom Whiting,
item.description: Despite its reputation as a European party destination, there is much more to Mallorca than drinking the night away in its numerous party resorts, such as Magaluf. With a peak higher than Ben Nevis in Scotland (the highest mountain in the British Isles) and many spots for hiking and climbing, this …
